remarks: Lemma for well-founded recursion.  The values of two acceptable functions agree within their domains.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 21-Apr-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
statement:
wfrlem5.1 $e |- R We A $.
wfrlem5.2 $e |- R Se A $.
wfrlem5.3 $e |- B = { f | E. x ( f Fn x /\ ( x C_ A /\ A. y e. x Pred ( R , A , y ) C_ x ) /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` Pred ( R , A , y ) ) ) ) } $.
wfrlem5 $p |- ( ( g e. B /\ h e. B ) -> ( ( x g u /\ x h v ) -> u = v ) ) $.
$d A f g h x y $.
$d F f g h x y $.
$d R f g h x y $.
$d g h u v x $.
